    • Constructor Detail

      • MediumEventLoop

        public MediumEventLoop(net.openhft.chronicle.core.threads.EventLoop parent,
                       String name,
                       Pauser pauser,
                       boolean daemon,
                       String binding)
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent event loop
        name - the name of this event hander
        pauser - the pause strategy
        daemon - is a demon thread
        binding - set affinity description, "any", "none", "1", "last-1"
